Name: The North Pole
About the game: The North Pole is a casual sandbox. Play as Santa and get ready for Christmas by helping Elves, complete challenges, collect ornaments and decorate the town tree! • Explore the North Pole • Interact with Elves • Find and collect ornaments to decorate the tree • Spread the Christmas cheer!
